                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
An animated fairy tale meets modern, live-action comedy. The beautiful princess 
Giselle is banished by an evil queen from her magical, musical animated land and 
finds herself in the gritty reality of the streets of modern-day Manhattan. 
Shocked by this strange new environment that doesn&#039;t operate on a "happily ever 
after" basis, Giselle is now adrift in a chaotic world badly in need of 
enchantment. But when Giselle begins to fall in love with a charmingly flawed 
divorce lawyer who has come to her aid - even though she is already promised to 
a perfect fairy tale prince back home - she has to wonder: Can a storybook view 
of romance survive in the real world?

Director: Kevin Lima

Writer  : Bill Kelly

Cast    : Julie Andrews (narrator)
        : Amy Adams
        : James Marsden
        : Idina Menzel
        : Susan Sarandon
